TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpPostedFile extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用戶端上載的個別檔案的存取。

span.span: Provides access to individual files that have been uploaded by a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別讓您從檔案收集用戶端上傳的所有檔案的存取。The class provides access to all the files that are uploaded from a client as a file collection. 類別提供屬性和方法來取得個別檔案的相關資訊，並讀取並儲存檔案。The class provides properties and methods to get information about an individual file and to read and save the file. 控制項可用來選取並上傳檔案，從用戶端。The control can be used to select and upload files from a client. 檔案會以 MIME multipart/form-data 格式上傳。Files are uploaded in MIME multipart/form-data format. 根據預設，所有的要求，包括表單欄位，並上傳大於 256 KB 檔案會緩衝至磁碟，而保留在伺服器記憶體中。By default, all requests, including form fields and uploaded files, larger than 256 KB are buffered to disk, rather than held in server memory. 您可以指定允許的最大要求大小，藉由存取屬性或藉由設定`maxRequestLength`屬性[httpRuntime 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) Machine.config 中的項目或Web.config 檔案。You can specify the maximum allowable request size by accessing the property or by setting the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element within the Machine.config or Web.config file. 預設值為 4 MB。The default is 4 MB. 可以藉由存取指定的要求，其中包含檔案上傳，伺服器記憶體中緩衝處理的資料量屬性或藉由設定`requestLengthDiskThreshold`屬性[httpRuntime 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) Machine.config 或 Web.config 檔案中的項目。The amount of data that is buffered in server memory for a request, which includes file uploads, can be specified by accessing the property or by setting the `requestLengthDiskThreshold` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element within the Machine.config or Web.config file. 藉由調整和屬性，您可以微調伺服器的效能。By adjusting the and properties, you can fine tune the performance of your server. 此外，您應該考慮設定以防止阻絕服務攻擊使用者張貼至伺服器的大型檔案所造成的。Additionally, you should consider setting the to prevent denial of service attacks caused by users posting large files to the server. 在要求結束時，會終結配置給緩衝處理上傳的檔案伺服器資源。Server resources that are allocated to buffer the uploaded file will be destroyed when the request ends. 若要儲存檔案的永久性複本，請使用方法。To save a durable copy of the file, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentLength As Integer
public: property int ContentLength { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得上傳的檔案大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets the size of an uploaded file, in bytes.

value.span: 檔案長度，以位元組為單位。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得用戶端所送出檔案的 MIME 內容類型。

span.span: Gets the MIME content type of a file sent by a client.

value.span: 上載檔案的 MIME 內容類型。

span.span: The MIME content type of the uploaded file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在迴圈中上傳的檔案集合的所有檔案，並採取動作，當檔案的 MIME 類型為`US-ASCII`。The following code example shows how to loop through all the files in the uploaded file collection and take action when the MIME type of a file is `US-ASCII`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得用戶端上檔案的完整名稱。

span.span: Gets the fully qualified name of the file on the client.

value.span: 用戶端檔案的名稱，包含目錄路徑。

span.span: The name of the client's file, including the directory path.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將已上傳的檔案 （檔案集合中的第一個檔案） 的名稱指派給字串變數。The following code example demonstrates how to assign the name of an uploaded file (the first file in the file collection) to a string variable. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputStream As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ InputStream { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 物件，該物件指向所上傳的檔案，以準備讀取該檔案的內容。

span.span: Gets a object that points to an uploaded file to prepare for reading the contents of the file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取的位元組陣列的用戶端的檔案集合中的第一個檔案的內容，然後將位元組陣列複製到字串。The following code example shows how to read the contents of the first file in the client's file collection into a byte array, and then copy the byte array to a string. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename) cil managed

span.span: The name of the saved file.

summary.span: 儲存已上傳的檔案內容。

span.span: Saves the contents of an uploaded file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允許的要求，其中包括上傳的檔案，大小上限預設為 4 MB。The maximum size allowed for a request, which includes uploaded files, is 4 MB, by default. 可以在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 檔案中指定最大要求大小`maxRequestLength`的屬性[httpRuntime 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)項目。Maximum request size can be specified in the Machine.config or Web.config file in the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element. 您可以使用指定的特定頁面的最大要求大小[location 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5) Web.config 檔案中的項目。The maximum request size for a specific page can be specified using the [location Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5) element in a Web.config file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何儲存上傳至 Web 伺服器的本機磁碟上的 C:\TempFiles 資料夾用戶端的所有檔案。The following code example demonstrates how to save all the files that are uploaded by the client to the C:\TempFiles folder on the Web server's local disk. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 物件的 屬性設為 ，但是 並非絕對路徑。

span.span: The property of the object is set to , but is not an absolute path.
